cnbc.title: Taiwan will invest $250 billion in U.S. chipmaking under new trade deal
cnbc.summary: The U.S. and Taiwan have reached a trade agreement to build chips and chip factories on American soil, the Department of Commerce announced Thursday.

cnbc.title: Amazon threatens 'drastic' action after Saks bankruptcy, says $475M stake is now worthless
cnbc.summary: Amazon invested $475 million into Saks' acquisition of Neiman Marcus. It wants a federal judge to reject Saks' bankruptcy plan because it harms creditors.

cnbc.title: Trump unveils health-care plan outline as Congress wrestles over Obamacare subsidies
cnbc.summary: Trump urged Congress, which is grappling over an extension of key ACA tax credits, to pass "The Great Healthcare Plan" without delay.

cnbc.title: Goldman Sachs CEO is looking at how the Wall Street bank can get involved in prediction markets
cnbc.summary: Goldman's interest comes as prediction markets gain visibility and debate swirls over market transparency and regulatory boundaries.

cnbc.title: NATO nations deploy to Greenland after tense White House talks
cnbc.summary: The joint NATO exercise comes shortly after tense talks between officials representing the U.S., Denmark and Greenland.

cnbc.title: AI startup Replit launches feature to vibe code mobile apps
cnbc.summary: Replit launched a feature that lets users create publishable mobile apps using just natural language prompts.

cnbc.title: Spotify hikes U.S. Premium subscription price
cnbc.summary: Co-founder Daniel Ek recently stepped down as CEO, with co-CEOs Gustav Söderström and Alex Norström now at the helm of the music streamer.

cnbc.title: Trump pitches direct payments to consumers for health care. What policy experts say about the plan
cnbc.summary: President Donald Trump wants to send payments directly to households for health costs. Experts think the plan may raise costs and the number of uninsured.

cnbc.title: Billionaire Rams owner Stan Kroenke becomes America's biggest private landowner
cnbc.summary: Kroenke represents a growing wave of ultra-wealthy entrepreneurs investing in long-held ranches and farmland.

cnbc.title: New York offshore wind project to resume construction after judge lifts Trump suspension
cnbc.summary: Equinor, the Norwegian company developing the project, said it "will now focus on safely restarting construction activities."
